questions.question_text_1: Ten students from classes 9 and 10 have been nominated to form the school committee.  The table below provides the number of boys and girls selected from each class:
questions.question_text_2: Ten students from classes 9 and 10 have been nominated to form the school committee.  The table below provides the number of boys and girls selected from each class:    The committee will consist of four students, with two students selected from each class uniformly at random.  Based on the above data, answer the given subquestions.
